div.p: Yours of the 4 & 6. recd yesterday and one from Charlie during the week which I will answer if I can but I am at the desk all day. I think she had better graduate at Mr Shayers and then if she wishes it and I have the means she can go to Live Hattie. Hattie had better continue I suppose Shayer will give her a sheepskin next I unr if he possibly can ask him if he can do it if she can get a diploma it will be of great service if she should have to teach for a living I think but little myself of a Diploma but the world think that is all sufficient endurance of the finess off

the holder to take charge of a school I hope there few tho girls will erse every exertion to get theirs, Genl Arme has offered me the postion of AssSpergo $6 per day and has written for the commission it will be here this month, the rank in the service is higher and the duties more pleasant, and pay better we had an alarm night before last clinnon proud U Billy was running backward The drums they were beat". cursed by a frucus among some negro troops who anounced themselves by firing on each other pity they took bad aim and everybody thought Forut had paid Memphis another visit the disturbance made me lose about one hour sleep for which I was not very thankful as you know I like

my full allowance, I am sorry that Ann is leaving you try and get some one that can do the hard work as I do not like you having to do it - I am eating at a tavern Mrs Cox him mond too far from my office for me to eat with him - Mr Buna wishes you to come down and spend some time at his house he has a very comfortable place he built for himself before the war but I do not see how you can leave the children. I would be delighted if it could be down as I want to see you so much - take care of my boy and do not let him be exposed and call in the doctor in time if any of you are sick
